summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that validate the functionality of the diagnostic manager and diagnostic test classes within the health simulation framework. The tests cover creation, registration, execution, sensitivity/specificity handling, consumable requirements, chaining of tests, categorical outcomes, and batch processing of diagnostic tests.
business_intent: To ensure that diagnostic components in the health simulation model operate correctly, respecting parameters such as sensitivity, specificity, consumable usage, and outcome categorisation, thereby supporting reliable simulation of health system diagnostics.
